titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the reverend Committee of divines, the 20th of May 1646 At their usuall place of meeting in Westminster. Vpon a text given the day before, by that godly and learned member of the Assembly Mr John Ley chair-man. By Sampson Bond minister of Gods word, at Mayden-head in Berks. Printed according to order.
titleStmt.author: Bond, Samson.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Macock, and are to be sold at the sign of the three leggs in the Poultry,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
